Community¶

class battlenet_client.d3.community.Community¶

Defines the methods to communicate with the Community API

static act(client, region_tag: str, *, act_id: Optional[int] = None, locale: Optional[str] = None)¶

Returns the list of acts, or the act by :act_id:

Parameters

  • (obj (client) – oauth): OpenID/OAuth instance

  • region_tag (str) – region_tag abbreviation

  • locale (str) – which locale to use for the request

  • act_id (int, optional) – the act’s ID to retrieve its data

Returns

the dict containing the list of acts or the details of the specified :act_id:

Return type

dict

static api_account(client, region_tag: str, bnet_tag: str, locale: Optional[str] = None)¶

Returns the specified account profile

Parameters

  • (obj (client) – oauth): OpenID/OAuth instance

  • region_tag (str) – region_tag abbreviation

  • locale (str) – which locale to use for the request

  • bnet_tag (str) – bnet tag of the user

Returns

the dict containing for the account

Return type

dict

static api_hero(client, region_tag: str, locale: str, bnet_tag: str, hero_id: str, category: Optional[str] = None)¶

Returns the follower by slug

Parameters

  • (obj (client) – oauth): OpenID/OAuth instance

  • region_tag (str) – region_tag abbreviation

  • locale (str) – which locale to use for the request

  • bnet_tag (str) – BNet tag for the account

  • hero_id (str) – Hero’s ID

  • category (str) – category to retrieve if specified (‘items’, ‘follower-items’)

Returns

the dict containing for the hero, items, or follower’s items

Return type

dict

static api_skill(client, region_tag: str, class_slug: str, skill_slug: str, locale: Optional[str] = None)¶

Returns a single skill by the by slug for the specified character class

Parameters

  • (obj (client) – oauth): OpenID/OAuth instance

  • region_tag (str) – region_tag abbreviation

  • locale (str) – which locale to use for the request

  • class_slug (str) – the slug of a character class

  • skill_slug (str) –

Returns

the dict containing for the skill

Return type

dict

Parameters

  • locale (str) – which locale to use for the request

  • artisan_slug (str) – the slug of the artisan
